## myhttps
### Installation
`pip install myhttps`

#### USAGE:
As a module from any location

`python3 -m myhttps [-option value]`

#### OPTIONS:
    --v             Version Info(**)
    --help          Help and usage Info(**)
    -p              Port Number [default: 11443]
    -h              Host address
    -c              ssl cert file location
    -k              ssl key file location
    -mode           HTTPS or HTTP
    -url            url to download
    -outdir         output directory
    -d              share directory
